source: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_SEQ_00<tab>Narujj Boh wishes to take advantage of your un-Amalj'aa-like appearance.
target: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_SEQ_00<tab>灰の陣営のナルジ・ボーは、冒険者に依頼があるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_SEQ_01<tab>Narujj Boh suspects that the boxes an Amalj'aa raider seized from an unfortunate merchant were filled with crystals. Speak with the troubled trader resting to the east of Little Ala Mhigo, and learn the contents of his stolen cargo.
target: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_SEQ_01<tab>ナルジ・ボーの依頼を受けた。リトルアラミゴの東にいる「困り果てた商人」と話し、事情を聞こう。

source: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_SEQ_02<tab>You question the troubled trader, and discover that his cargo did, indeed, consist of a substantial number of crystals. Make haste into Zanr'ak, find the stolen boxes, and catch the thief himself before he hands over the bulk of his haul to Ifrit's eager clergy.
target: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_SEQ_02<tab>困り果てた商人と話した。ザンラクにある「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E890901 /var>」を3つ取り戻そう。また、ザンラク祭場周辺にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E907001 /var>」を探し出し、付近の「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F208FE01 /var>」を倒してから取り戻そう。

source: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_SEQ_03<tab>You have recovered all of the crystal-filled boxes. Make your way back to the troubled trader, and return to him his precious cargo.
target: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E890901 /var>と<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E890A01 /var>をすべて取り戻した。リトルアラミゴの東にいる「困り果てた商人」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_SEQ_04<tab>You return with the cargo of crystals, to the merchant's overwhelming joy and relief. Return to the Ring of Ash and report to Narujj Boh.
target: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_SEQ_04<tab>困り果てた商人に荷物を返した。灰の陣営の「ナルジ・ボー」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_SEQ_05<tab>You inform Narujj Boh of the successful retrieval of the trader's wares. The Brotherhood warrior thanks you for your deeds, relieved that your presence has averted a potential disaster.
target: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_SEQ_05<tab>ナルジ・ボーに報告した。アマルジャ族がヒトと相対すれば誤解を生むと考えている彼は、自分に代わって依頼を果たしてくれた冒険者に深く感謝していた。またの機会に協力しよう。

source: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the troubled trader to the east of Little Ala Mhigo.
target: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_TODO_00<tab>リトルアラミゴ東の困り果てた商人と話す

source: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_TODO_01<tab>Recover boxes of crystals in Zanr'ak.
TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_TODO_02<tab>Defeat the Amalj'aa porter, and recover the large box of crystals.
target: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_TODO_02<tab>ザンラク祭場周辺で<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F208FE01 /var>を倒し<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E890A01 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the boxes of crystals to the troubled trader.
target: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_TODO_03<tab>困り果てた商人にクリスタル商の箱を渡す

source: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_NARUJIBOH_000_000<tab>Greetings, honored ally. Have you heard the murmuring around the camp? It seems a bedraggled merchant has wandered close to the Ring of Ash after escaping a Flamefang attacker.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_NARUJIBOH_000_000灰の陣営の近くに、「炎牙衆」に襲われ逃げ出した
ヒトの商隊がさまよっているらしい。
商隊が運んでいたのは、大量のクリスタルだと聞く。

source: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_NARUJIBOH_000_001<tab>Our scout reports that the single ambusher appeared more interested in the trader's cargo─a number of boxes that drew our addled kin's undivided attention. I strongly suspect that only a haul of crystals would outweigh the value of a potential tempered slave.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_NARUJIBOH_000_001鼠窃狗盗……これを奪われれば、
奴らの野望、焔神の神降ろしが果たされるやもしれん！
なんとしてでも、クリスタルを取り返さねばならぬ！

source: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_NARUJIBOH_000_002<tab>If this is true, then we cannot allow the contents of those boxes to reach the Zahar'ak Amalj'aa and their summoning rituals! ...And considering the circumstances of his misfortune, I think it best that you be the one to approach this trader and confirm my suspicions.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_NARUJIBOH_000_002そこで強き者よ、お主の出番ぞ！
被害を受けた商隊がヒトなれば、ヒトであるお主が好都合。
商人の元へ赴き、話を聞かん！

source: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_MERCHANT_001_005<tab>Oh, thank Nald, an adventurer! I have just suffered an attack at the hands of an Amalj'aa ruffian! I managed to escape with my life, but the brute made off with my cargo of crystals!
target:
TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_MERCHANT_001_005ああ、冒険者さん……いいところに！
クリスタルを運搬中、アマルジャ族に襲撃を受けたんです。
命からがら逃げてきたのですが、大切な積荷が……。

source: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_MERCHANT_001_006<tab>The last I saw of the fiend, he was stumbling off to the south with my boxes precariously balanced one atop the other. I can't imagine he made it very far... Perhaps you might still catch the vile brigand!
target:
TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_MERCHANT_001_006積荷を奪った奴らは「ザンラク祭場」に向かっていきました！
どうか、アマルジャ族から、
クリスタルの積荷を取り返してください！

source: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_MERCHANT_000_010<tab>I'm ruined. Ruined! Why did I choose this route!? Why did I not listen to the warnings!?
target:
TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_MERCHANT_000_010ああ、なんてことだ、これじゃ大損だ！
こんな危険な道、通るんじゃなかった……。

source: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_MERCHANT_000_011<tab>You rescued my cargo of crystals!? Huzzah! A wonder you are, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, a gods-blessed wonder! How...how did you carry all those boxes, anyway? I shall have to retrieve my wagon before I can be on my way...
target:
TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_MERCHANT_000_011なんと、クリスタルを取り戻してくれたのですか！？
ありがとうございました！
少し休んだら立ち去ることにします。

source: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_MERCHANT_001_012<tab>The Immortal Flames cautioned me about the rising number of Amalj'aa attacks, but I thought perhaps I could slip through their lands unnoticed. What a perfect fool I was...
target:
TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_MERCHANT_001_012不滅隊に「アマルジャ族に気をつけろ」と言われてたけど……
まさか本当に襲われることになるなんて。
ううう……災難だなぁ……。

source: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_NARUJIBOH_000_020<tab>I will not send you into enemy territory on the strength of a suspicion. Speak with this unlucky merchant and learn what cargo he carried.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_NARUJIBOH_000_020被害を受けた商隊がヒトなれば、ヒトであるお主が好都合！
強き者よ、お主の活躍に期待するぞ！

source: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_NARUJIBOH_000_030<tab>So, my suspicions were correct. And you have returned the crystals to the trader? I thank you for averting this disaster.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_NARUJIBOH_000_030クリスタルを無事奪い返し、商人に預けてくれたか……。
我らはこの容貌ゆえ、ヒトと相対せば誤解を生む恐れあり。
されど、お主のおかげで其は避けられた。

source: TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_NARUJIBOH_000_031<tab>We are fortunate for your aid, honored ally. I fear the intervention of the Brotherhood would have only exacerbated matters...
target:
TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_NARUJIBOH_000_031難しい仕事を、よくぞこなしてくれた。
あらためて感謝する、強き者よ！
TEXT_BANAMA209_01240_ACCESS_MESSAGE<tab>その行動は出現した敵を倒さないと実行できません
